channel.title: Hyperion PJA Problem
channel.description:
I have everything running and working fine, but for some reason the client will not connect. It is on 127.0.0.1 and I have no errors. The client just gets stuck on Connecting To Update Server.
Things I have tried: Running through Eclipse(You probably should for like everything lol). Ip is set correctly Yes I run the source before the client.. Changing clients and servers
Don't comment below saying: If you can't get this working you should quit and not use Hyperion...
I am not asking for a spoon feed just a little help here(obviously this is pretty simple I just don't understand what is wrong).
Yea thanks.

item.title: Hyperion PJA Problem
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

are you using a 459 client?

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion PJA Problem
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

I have everything running and working fine, but for some reason the client will not connect. It is on 127.0.0.1 and I have no errors. The client just gets stuck on Connecting To Update Server.

Things I have tried:
Running through Eclipse(You probably should for like everything lol).
Ip is set correctly
Yes I run the source before the client…
Changing clients and servers

Don’t comment below saying: If you can’t get this working you should quit and not use Hyperion…

I am not asking for a spoon feed just a little help here(obviously this is pretty simple I just don’t understand what is wrong).

Yea thanks.

Read full topic
